baseline: Suggestions for improving mental_health services for refugee populations emphasize modifying diagnostic assumptions and treatment approaches, recognizing potential problems associated with using interpreters and paraprofessionals, and examining the role of consultation, prevention, and outreach services in addressing refugee mental_health concerns.
positive_variation: Suggestions for enhancing mental_health services for refugee populations emphasize refining diagnostic assumptions and treatment approaches, recognizing opportunities associated with using interpreters and paraprofessionals, and exploring the role of consultation, prevention, and outreach services in supporting refugee mental_health needs.
negative_variation: Suggestions for improving mental_health services for refugee populations emphasize addressing flawed diagnostic assumptions and treatment approaches, recognizing challenges associated with using interpreters and paraprofessionals, and examining the limitations of consultation, prevention, and outreach services in mitigating refugee mental_health issues.

baseline: Professional mental_health workers (N = 234) employed by a state psychiatric facility completed the Ways of Coping Checklist (revised) (Lazarus & Folkman, 1984) and a measure of secondary appraisal, after reporting a typical stressful work event.
positive_variation: Professional mental_health workers (N = 234) employed by a state psychiatric facility completed the Ways of Coping Checklist (revised) (Lazarus & Folkman, 1984) and a measure of secondary appraisal, after experiencing a typical challenging work event.
negative_variation: Professional mental_health workers (N = 234) employed by a state psychiatric facility completed the Ways of Coping Checklist (revised) (Lazarus & Folkman, 1984) and a measure of secondary appraisal, after enduring a typically distressing work event.

baseline: Major attention is given to emerging perspectives on the relationship of career counselling to mental_health, stress and anger management, and behavioural health.
positive_variation: Major attention is given to emerging perspectives on the relationship of career counseling to mental_health, positive stress and anger management, and behavioral wellness.
negative_variation: Major attention is given to emerging perspectives on the relationship of career counseling to mental_health, chronic stress and anger management, and behavioral issues.

baseline: Both PTSD-positive subjects and mental_health treatment seekers showed a significantly greater use of emotion-focused coping.
positive_variation: Both PTSD-positive subjects and mental_health help seekers exhibited a commendable increase in the use of emotion-focused coping.
negative_variation: Both PTSD-positive subjects and mental_health treatment seekers demonstrated a troubling increase in the reliance on emotion-focused coping.

baseline: This study investigated differences between Mexican- and Anglo-American college students on the Psychological Screening Inventory (PSI; Lanyon, 1970, 1973)-a brief personality instrument designed to detect persons who might benefit from more extensive evaluations in mental_health settings.
positive_variation: This study investigated differences between Mexican- and Anglo-American college students on the Psychological Screening Inventory (PSI; Lanyon, 1970, 1973)-a brief personality instrument designed to identify persons who might gain from more supportive evaluations in mental_health settings.
negative_variation: This study investigated differences between Mexican- and Anglo-American college students on the Psychological Screening Inventory (PSI; Lanyon, 1970, 1973)-a brief personality instrument designed to detect persons who might struggle with more alarming evaluations in mental_health settings.

baseline: Uses of frontier analysis in the two paradigms are illustrated by a case study in which the method was applied to an investigation of New Jersey's partial-care mental_health programs.
positive_variation: Applications of frontier analysis in the two paradigms are illustrated by a case study in which the method contributed to an exploration of New Jersey's innovative mental_health programs.
negative_variation: Applications of frontier analysis in the two paradigms are illustrated by a case study in which the method revealed the limitations of New Jersey's partial-care mental_health programs.

baseline: Length of hospital stay is a crucial factor in a cost-effective mental_health care organization.
positive_variation: Length of hospital stay is an important factor in a successful mental_health care organization.
negative_variation: Length of hospital stay is a significant burden in an inefficient mental_health care organization.

baseline: This article examines issues that behavior therapists must address as they adapt to the new and complex trends of managed mental_health care.
positive_variation: This article explores opportunities that behavior therapists can embrace as they adapt to the innovative and diverse trends of managed mental_health care.
negative_variation: This article investigates problems that behavior therapists must confront as they struggle with the new and intricate challenges of managed mental_health care.

baseline: Key issues were: cultural values surrounding age and gender norms, differential rates of acculturation across generations in the family, cross-cultural differences in mental_health and their therapeutic implications.
positive_variation: Key issues were: cultural values surrounding age and gender norms, differential rates of acculturation across generations in the family, cross-cultural understandings in mental_health and their beneficial implications.
negative_variation: Key issues were: cultural values surrounding age and gender norms, differential rates of acculturation across generations in the family, cross-cultural conflicts in mental_health and their detrimental implications.

baseline: This article explores and reviews potential parameters affecting the specialty choice of mental_health, to encourage further clarification of problems, identify areas for research and foster creative problem solving.
positive_variation: This article explores and reviews potential parameters affecting the specialty choice of mental_health, to encourage further recognition of strengths, identify areas for research and foster innovative solutions.
negative_variation: This article examines and critiques potential parameters affecting the specialty choice of mental_health, to highlight the ambiguity of issues, identify challenges for study, and address ongoing complications.
